title: Tussle Outside Turkish Embassy Puts Guards in Focus (Audio)
itunes:title: Tussle Outside Turkish Embassy Puts Guards in Focus (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Ruth Wedgwood, a professor at Johns Hopkins School of Advanced International Studies, discusses the legal status of several guards at the Turkish embassy in Washington D.C., who got in physical altercations with U.S. citizens outside the embassy last week. She speaks with Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
